examples.description: sets an instance variable @total on initialization to zero
examples.full_description: CashRegister ::new sets an instance variable @total on initialization to zero

examples.description: optionally takes an employee discount on initialization
examples.full_description: CashRegister ::new optionally takes an employee discount on initialization

examples.description: accepts a title and a price and increases the total
examples.full_description: CashRegister #add_item accepts a title and a price and increases the total
CashRegister #add_item also accepts an optional quantity

examples.description: doesn't forget about the previous total
examples.full_description: CashRegister #add_item doesn't forget about the previous total

examples.description: applies the discount to the total price
examples.full_description: CashRegister #apply_discount the cash register was initialized with an employee discount applies the discount to the total price

examples.description: returns success message with updated total
examples.full_description: CashRegister #apply_discount the cash register was initialized with an employee discount returns success message with updated total
CashRegister #apply_discount the cash register was initialized with an employee discount reduces the total

examples.description: returns a string error message that there is no discount to apply
examples.full_description: CashRegister #apply_discount the cash register was not initialized with an employee discount returns a string error message that there is no discount to apply
